description: Practice the future perfect continuous tense with fill-in-the-blank questions.

questions.question: I ____ (work) here for ten years by next month.
She ____ (study) English for five years by the time she graduates.
They ____ (live) in that house for twenty years by 2025.
We ____ (wait) for two hours by the time the concert starts.
He ____ (play) guitar for fifteen years by his next birthday.
You ____ (learn) French for a whole year by December.

title: Future Perfect Continuous
